Texts.Chs: 在^orange;采集工作台^reset;处制造^orange;1个采矿头盔^reset;然后返回。
Texts.Eng: Craft a ^green;1 Mining Helmet^reset; at a ^orange;Foraging Table^reset; and return.

Texts.Chs: 我终于可以制造象征着我和^green;克里门汀^reset;^orange;爱情的信物了^reset;，我总是在她72年不幸去世之前答应她。拿着这个，谢谢你，朋友。
Texts.Eng: I kin finally make ^green;Clementine^reset; a ^orange;symbol of our love^reset; I always promised 'afore her tragic passing back in '72. Take this, and my thanks, friend.

Texts.Chs: 我希望得到^orange;银^reset;，但我会在封闭空间中感到不适。你可以^green;在相当深的地下^reset;发现^orange;银矿^reset;。^orange;5个银锭^reset;应该够了。
Texts.Eng: I'm lookin' to acquire some ^orange;Silver^reset;, but I ain't no good in enclosed spaces. You'll find ^orange;Silver^reset; commonly ^green;at a decent depth underground^reset;. ^orange;5 Silver Bars^reset; should be plenty.
